quic_adult_cj_1.Description: I had a set morning routine on school days (i.e., I usually did the same thing each day to get ready).

quic_adult_cj_2.Description: My parents were often late to pick me up (e.g. from school, aftercare, or sports).

quic_adult_cj_3.Description: My parents kept track of what I ate (e.g., made sure that I didn't skip meals or tried to make sure that I ate healthy food.

quic_adult_cj_4.Description: My family ate a meal together most days.

quic_adult_cj_5.Description: My parents tried to make sure I got a good night's sleep (e.g., I had a regular bed time, my parents checked to make sure I went to sleep).

quic_adult_cj_6.Description: I had a bedtime routine (e.g., my parents tucked me in, my parents read me a book, I took a bath).

quic_adult_cj_7.Description: In my afterschool or free time hours at least one of my parents knew what I was doing.

quic_adult_cj_8.Description: I usually knew when my parents were going to be home.

quic_adult_cj_9.Description: At least one of my parents regularly checked that I did my homework.

quic_adult_cj_10.Description: At least one of my parents regularly kept track of my school progress.

quic_adult_cj_11.Description: At least one of my parents had punishments that were unpredictable.

quic_adult_cj_12.Description: I often wondered whether or not one of my parents would come home at the end of the day.

quic_adult_cj_13.Description: There were often people coming and going in my house that I did not expect to be there.

quic_adult_cj_14.Description: At least one parent made time each day to see how I was doing.

quic_adult_cj_15.Description: My familiy planned activities to do together.

quic_adult_cj_16.Description: At least one of my parents would plan something for the family, but then not follow through with the plan.

quic_adult_cj_17.Description: My family had holiday traditions that we did every year (e.g. cooking a special food at a particular time of year/decorate the house the same way).

quic_adult_cj_18.Description: There was a long period of time when I didn't see one of my parents (e.g. military deployment, jail time, custody arrangements).

quic_adult_cj_19.Description: I experienced changes in my custody arrangement.

quic_adult_cj_21.Description: At least one of my parents changed jobs frequently.

quic_adult_cj_22.Description: There were times when one of my parents was unemployed and couldn't find a job even though he/she wanted one.

quic_adult_cj_23.Description: There was a period of time when I often worried that I was not going to have enough food to eat.

quic_adult_cj_24.Description: There was a period of time when I often worried that my family would not have enough money to pay for necessities like clothing or bills.

quic_adult_cj_25.Description: There was a period of time when I did not feel safe in my home.

quic_adult_cj_28.Description: My parents had a stable relationship with each other.

quic_adult_cj_30.Description: At least one of my parents had many romantic partners.

quic_adult_cj_31.Description: At least one of my parents was disorganized.

quic_adult_cj_32.Description: At least one of my parents was unpredictable.

quic_adult_cj_33.Description: For at least one of my parents, when they were upset I did not know how they would act.

quic_adult_cj_34.Description: One of my parents could go from calm to furious in an instant.

quic_adult_cj_35.Description: One of my parents could go from calm to stressed or nervous in an instant.

quic_adult_cj_36.Description: I lived in a clean house.

quic_adult_cj_37.Description: I lived in a cluttered house (e.g., piles of stuff everywhere).

quic_adult_cj_38.Description: In my house things I needed were often misplaced so that I could not find them.
